The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

Semoga TerEnt- Membantu! :D

Jawaban:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

related_questions.question:
The following text is for questions number 26 - 30.    Baturaden is a tourist destination in Banyumas regency, Central Java, Indonesia. It is located in the northern
town of Purwokerto just on the south slope of Mount Slamet with height 640 m above sea level. The air temper
ture ranges between 180-25° Celsius with humidity from 70 to 80 mm Hg.
The air in Baturaden is very cool but the scenery is very beautiful and natural. From the town of Purwokerto, the
road to this Baturraden is only about 14 km to the north, and can be reached by public transportation.
Baturaden also a tourist area visited by many local tourists, as well as foreign tourists, especially on Sundays
and national holidays. To accommodate them, there are some hotels and inn available there. ​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

terjemahan

Baturaden adalah tujuan wisata di Kabupaten Banyumas, Jawa Tengah, Indonesia. Itu terletak di utara

kota Purwokerto tepat di lereng selatan Gunung Slamet dengan ketinggian 640 m di atas permukaan laut. Temperatur udara

suhu berkisar antara 180-25° Celcius dengan kelembaban 70 hingga 80 mm Hg.

Udara di Baturaden sangat sejuk namun pemandangannya sangat indah dan alami. Dari kota Purwokerto,

jalan menuju Baturraden ini hanya berjarak sekitar 14 km ke arah utara, dan dapat ditempuh dengan kendaraan umum.

Baturaden juga merupakan kawasan wisata yang banyak dikunjungi wisatawan lokal, maupun wisatawan mancanegara, terutama pada hari Minggu

dan hari libur nasional. Untuk menampung mereka, ada beberapa hotel dan penginapan yang tersedia di sana.

related_questions.question: Fill in the blank with following verbs (lived ,came,went ,did,was)6. the crocodile ....hungry 7. my father ....to his office this morning 8.they ...to my party last sunday 9. the queen ...in the jungle 10. ....you watch the show yesterday

answers.answer:
~ Answer:

6. (e) was

The crocodile was hungry.

7. (c) went

My father went to his office this morning.

8. (b) came

They came to my party last Sunday.

9. (a) lived

The Queen lived in the jungle.

10. (d) did

Did you watch the show yesterday?

.

~ Discussion:

Halo dan salam kenal. Mari kita bahas cara penyelesaian pernyataan-pernyataan di atas dengan kata kerja yang sesuai ya.

「

Kita nyatakan semua pernyataan dalam bentuk pekerjaan/keberadaan yang berada di masa lalu yang menggunakan past tense.

」

》6. The crocodile ... hungry.

  • Kalimat ini termasuk bentuk nominal. Setiap kalimat nominal dibantu oleh kata kerja bantu (helping verb).

Helping verb untuk verbal form adalah did sedangkan nominal form adalah was/were.

—> jawabannya: e. was

》7. My father ... to his office this morning.

  • Kita dapat menyatakan dengan went. Alasannya karena adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kepergian. Dalam konteks ini, lebih sesuai dengan went ketimbang came karena subyek yang berada di tempat berasalnya akan meninggalkan tempat itu ke tempat lain sehingga diartikan bukan "datang" melainkan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: c. went

》8. They ... to my party last Sunday.

  • Adanya kata to menunjukkan tujuan kehadiran. Menurut konteks ini, subyek yang sudah tidak berada di tempat asalnya, sudah berada di tempat lain. Tempat lain itulah yang ditargetkan sehingga mereka menjadi "datang" bukan "pergi".

—> jawabannya: b. came

》9. The Queen ... in the jungle.

  • Kalimat di atas menyatakan keberadaan subyek. Kita dapat melengkapinya dengan kata kerja lived.

—> jawabannya: a. lived

》10. ... you watch the show yesterday?

  • Adanya tanda tanya membuktikan kalimat tersebut dalam bentuk interogatif.

Kalimat tersebut ada verba watch sehingga termasuk kalimat verbal. Gunakan kata kerja bantu did.

—> jawabannya: d. did

~ Thank you and hope this answer may be helpful.

Good luck! ✿

related_questions.question:
Read the following text to answer the q.    Pink Beach
Last holiday I went to Komodo island. There is a gorgeous beach which has pink colored-sand. The
beach is called Pink Beach or Pantai Merah Muda,
Il's a huge beach with a calm wave. When I looked it closely, I could see that it actually an ordinary
white beach sand. But there are a lot of crushed corals and minerals that make it looks pink. Pink beach is a
special beach, There's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like this.
1. What is the text about?
2. Where is it located ?
3. Why the sand has pink color?
4. Why does the writer think that Pink Beach is a special one?
5.
" ....... It actually an ordinary white beach sand."
What is the Indonesian translation of the underlined word ?​

answers.answer:
1. Pink beach

2. Komodo Island

3. Because a lot of crushed corals and minerals make the sand looks pink

4. because there's no one beach in this world has a beautiful pink sand like that

5. mana kata bergaris bawah nya?

semoga bermanfaat.

1.pink beach

2.in comodo island

3.Because that is a gorgeous beach

4.Because that's beach verry langkah

5.pantai merah.

Penjelasan:

SEMOGA TIDAK MEMBANTU
